item.title: Job Forward introduces the Startup Essence referral tool for startups and small to medium enterprises (SMEs)
item.description:
Source: Job Forward. Job Forward, the first online social recruitment platform in Singapore, has introduced Startup Essence. This new addition to their referral-based platform helps startups and small to medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) by allowing them to build recruitment pages that attract and engage potential employees. The company aims to create a new avenue for these businesses to connect with individuals who are a good fit for their company culture...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/job-forward-introduces-the-startup-essence-referral-tool-for-startups-and-small-to-medium-enterprises-smes/
